entries.content: Starting work session on logo animation with Moti
Organized logo animations by creating grid-animations subfolder. Moved CSSWaveController.js and PulseWaveAnimation.js into animations/grid-animations/ and updated import path in index.html
Planning new color gradient wave animation: Create color-animations folder with gradient wave that spreads radially from center outward

## Semantix Logo Animation Architecture Research

### Key Components Analyzed:
1. SemantixLogoOrchestrator.js - Main coordinator
2. CSSWaveController.js - CSS-based wave animation
3. PulseWaveAnimation.js - Anime.js-based pulse animation
4. CubeGridManager.js - Cube collection manager
5. SemantixCube.js - Individual cube controller
6. SemantixLogoSVG.js - SVG generation
7. SemantixLogoConfig.js - Configuration

### Animation Controller Interface Requirements:
- start() - Begin animation
- stop() - End animation and cleanup
- pause() - Pause animation (can resume)
- resume() - Resume paused animation
- continue() - Restart after grid size change
- updateGridSize(newGridSize) - Update grid reference
- isActive() - Check if running

### SVG Structure & Colors:
- Each cube has unique linearGradient fill (grad-1 to grad-16)
- Gradients use 5-stop color scheme: #999999 → #777777 → #555555 → #333333 → #222222
- Cubes are SVG <rect> elements with class "logo-cube"
- Each has data-cube attribute (1-16), x, y, width, height, opacity

### Color Manipulation Approach for Gradient Wave:
Can modify CSS custom properties dynamically on cube elements to create color gradients propagating from center outward

Successfully implemented radial color gradient wave animation that spreads from center outward. Created color-animations folder with ColorGradientWaveController.js (CSS-based, Euclidean distance calculation, HSL color space) and color-gradient-wave.css. Integrated into index.html with full UI controls for speed, base hue, hue shift, and duration.
Planning UI improvement: Create animation list/menu where clicking an animation name shows only its controls and hides others. This will organize the growing control panel better.

Implemented animation selector UI: Created clickable list of animation names that toggles visibility of respective control panels. Only one animation's controls shown at a time. Added animation-selector.css with fade-in transitions, active state highlighting, and hover effects. JavaScript logic handles show/hide toggling.
